issues.message: Use 'Akka.Cluster.Sharding.Shard.StateChange' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Cluster.Sharding.Shard.EntityStopped'.
Use 'Akka.Cluster.Sharding.Shard.StateChange' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Cluster.Sharding.Shard.EntityStarted'.

Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<Akka.Actor.IActorRef, System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableList<string>>>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableDictionary<Akka.Actor.IActorRef, System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableList<string>>'.

Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<Akka.Actor.IActorRef, System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableList<string>>>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableDictionary<Akka.Actor.IActorRef, System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableList<string>>'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
